TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed StringExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: UWP specific helpers for working with strings.

.method public static hidebysig string GetLocalized(string resourceKey) cil managed

static member GetLocalized : string -> string

Docs.summary: Retrieves the provided resource for the given key for use independent of the UI thread.
Docs.returns: string value for given resource or empty string if not found.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetLocalized (this string resourceKey, string resourcePath);
.method public static hidebysig string GetLocalized(string resourceKey, string resourcePath) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function GetLocalized (resourceKey As String, resourcePath As String) As String
static member GetLocalized : string * string -> string
public static string? GetLocalized (this string resourceKey, string resourcePath);

Docs.param: Resource path to fall back to in case resourceKey not found in app resources.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the provided resource for the given key for use independent of the UI thread. First looks up resource at the application level, before falling back to provided resourcePath. This allows for easily overridable resources within a library.
Docs.returns: string value for given resource or empty string if not found.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Numerics.Quaternion ToQuaternion (this string text);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Numerics.Quaternion ToQuaternion(string text) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function ToQuaternion (text As String) As Quaternion
static member ToQuaternion : string -> System.Numerics.Quaternion

Docs.param: A with the values to parse.
Docs.summary: Converts a value to a value. This method always assumes the invariant culture for parsing values (',' separates numbers, '.' is the decimal separator). Additionally, the format "<float, float, float, float>" is also allowed (though less efficient to parse).
Docs.exception: Thrown when doesn't represent a valid value.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Numerics.Vector2 ToVector2 (this string text);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Numerics.Vector2 ToVector2(string text) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function ToVector2 (text As String) As Vector2
static member ToVector2 : string -> System.Numerics.Vector2

Docs.param: A with the values to parse.
Docs.summary: Converts a value to a value. This method always assumes the invariant culture for parsing values (',' separates numbers, '.' is the decimal separator). The input text can either represents a single number (mapped to , or multiple components. Additionally, the format "<float, float>" is also allowed (though less efficient to parse).
Docs.exception: Thrown when doesn't represent a valid value.
